page.title: 10BRYN-WEATHER JAN/MAR 1985.
page.content: CLASS 3 STUDIED THE WEATHER FOR THE SPRING TERM (JAN TO MAR).THESE ARE THEIR RESULTS: {TEMP: } DAYS: {WIND: }DAYS: -10_-5 = 15 N. = 11 -4 _ 0 = 16 N.E. = 04 1 _ 5 = 26 E. = 06 6 _10 = 28 S.E. = 04 10 _20 = 06 S. = 24 S.W. = 11 W. = 15 N.W. = 16 {WEATHER: }DAYS: {RAINFALL:}DAYS: SNOW = 16 0.0_1.5 = 35 RAIN = 34 1.6_2.5 = 27 SUNNY/DRY = 19 2.6_3.5 = 14 SUNNY/WET = 19 3.6_4.5 = 02 FOG = 03 4.6_5.5 = 03 HAIL/SLEET = 07 5.5 + = 10 THE STUDY COVERED A TOTAL OF 91 DAYS. IT HAS LEAD TO A PERMANENT WEATHER STATION BEING SET UP BY THE PUPILS.
